pr_title: fix #2070 Avoid cancel in toFuture#onNext on Mono source

timeline.message: fix #2070 Avoid cancel in toFuture#onNext on Mono source

timeline.bodyText: I can't find any use of this constructor where sourceCanEmitMoreThanOnce is true. Do we even need it?
timeline.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText: no we don't use it but since this is a Subscriber nothing in the constructor would force us to use it exclusively with a Mono. If we ever use it on a Flux that signature will force us to consider the cancel-in-onNext case (which would become necessary) rather than totally forget about it.
replies.author: simonbasle
